code: import React from'react';import{Avatar,Card,Divider,Button,Row,Col}from'antd';import{FormOutlined,UserOutlined,MailOutlined,MobileOutlined}from'@ant-design/icons';import DetallesFisioModal from'./detalles.fisio.modal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function DetallesPaciente(_ref){let{paciente,setIsEditModalOpen}=_ref;const TYPE='fisio';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:16,paddingBottom:4,display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'center',backgroundColor:'white',width:'25%',borderRadius:8},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:8},children:[paciente.avatar.length>9?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{width:82,src:'https://api.recreamed.com/images/'+paciente.avatar,alt:"ProfilePic",style:{alignSelf:'center'}}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{size:82,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserOutlined,{}),className:"btnIconCentered",style:{alignSelf:'center'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:8}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"nombre",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserOutlined,{style:{marginRight:10}})," ",paciente.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"datos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MailOutlined,{style:{marginRight:10}})," ",paciente.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"datos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MobileOutlined,{style:{marginRight:10}})," ",paciente.telefono]}),TYPE==='fisio'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DetallesFisioModal,{userData:paciente}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'row-reverse',paddingRight:16},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btnIconCentered",onClick:()=>setIsEditModalOpen(true),size:"small",type:"primary",shape:"circle",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormOutlined,{className:"sizedIcon"}),ghost:true})})]})});}
